title: I need books for the NEET, but I can't buy them. Can you help me? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1 problem 5 solutions :) So what we need to score at least 600 in NEET NCERT+short crisp notes+crytal clear basic conecpt+a lot of motivation from inner yourself+confidence in yourself and your preparation to handle the 3 hour exam environmental pressure on yourself The last two solutions are hidden in your preparation level NCERT: You can download pdf at free of cost from any webiste Notes: YOUTUBE, choose the channels from which you want to study, follow them and make notes from their lectures. ASISH ARORA Sir’s one shot Physics revision is a must in my accordance! TEST: You can join any TELEGRAM channel(there are many, providing free NEET mock papers)and attempt them, see the solutions, analyse your mistakes,correct them in the next revision test and at last your mistakes will be reduced. Extra books: NCERT exemplar,again you can find it in any website free. Join TELEGRAM channels providing free question polls everyday DON'T JOIN ANY TELEGRAM 'DISCUSSION' CHANNEL. With your 4–5 friends, you can create a whatsapp group and discuss about some questions or concepts(I used to get a lot of help from 2–3 of my friends who were connected to me through whatsapp but you have to choose wisely your friend circle, atleast in these preparation days) For extra question practise you can try errorless physics app(free) Allen/aakash chemistry (available in many websites and telegram channel at free of cost) MTG NCERT at your fingertips|ALLEN NCR(any website/telegram channel) NEET PYQ: DISHA/MTG books available You can also try some youtube channels solving NTA NEET question papers and JEE main question papers I used to solve NTA MOCK BIO papers from youtube(after No. 60 paper, they are mostly NCERT based) ,also Chemistry papers mainly INORGANIC and ORGANIC { PMS sir inorganic, Sharad kothari sir organic, MCCMarvelprofs for full chem paper solution sometimes} I solved last 30 years JEE MAINS Physics(Asish arora sir)and Chemistry questions from Youtube. TRY TO BE PRODUCTIVE EVERY MOMENT GREAT AUTHORS DON'T GET YOU GREAT MARKS IF YOU ARE NOT DOING GREAT JOB! So stick to basics and then uplift your performance slowly, step by step. THANK YOU SK P.S. If you want ALLEN NEET UG TEST PAPERS 2019–20(NOT DLP) then DM me.

Hey!! I would be glad if I can help you in any way.Recently I wanted to buy few NCERT books for my siblings and at that moment of time i did not have the required sum of money .I asked about getting books at a cheaper price by one friend whom I follow on a social media platform .In answer to my question I got to know about a website named mypustak that provides second-hand books. Various books on competitive exams and other genres are available at free of cost. You just have to visit the website buy whichever book you want and get them at your doorstep. All you need to pay is a small delivery and handling charge for the books. You can buy medical books at mypustak. It will be cheap and hence would be easy for you to buy them. Also, you contribute to saving the environment by buying second-hand books.  So visit the website as soon as possible and buy the books for NEET. ALL THE BEST!!
